message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it.  I'm asking for $110 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only willing to pay $90 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $95.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it, but I still believe $85 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
